paragraph: Shri Ram College provides a great environment for students, sports players and BCA teachers are very nice to us they teaches coding in computer lab which is more effective for beginners.
name: Kannu Mandora

paragraph: I am a BCA student ,the schedule plan is designed well to cover maximum topics in the subject ,the faculty provide us all required materials ,also guide us to attain knowledge, labs are held at projector explanation
name: Sumit Aggarwal

paragraph: Yes my college has all the necessary facilities and equipment. The facilities I have in my college are classrooms, laboratories. They are all used and are all well maintained.
name: Simran Singh Kinra

paragraph: Its a memorable place we enjoyed a lot with lots of events , Good staff , It is located at main city , Near to college we have lots of shops, hotels , markets , and almost near to every service
name: Sunil Kumar
